div.head: Submitting Content to VSim
div.p: Gosh, what a great question. When we have an answer for this, we will put it here.
We should explain the nuts and bolts of how to submit a new model here, kind of like a focused mini-tour, just to outline the process
Most electronic formats can be placed in VSim. If we have specific guidance it can go here.
Publishers may restrict your ability to include previously published content in an open access repository. Contact us for help in determining the guidelines for specific journals and publishers.
Contact us if you have questions about submitting content, preferred file formats, and publisher restrictions on previously published material.
